      • getNextInstruction

        public MUCInstruction getNextInstruction()
        Returns a step instruction determined by the user of the MUCGUI. Is used by the MinUnsatCore algorithm to prompt the bridge for the next step.
        Returns:
        null, if no new instruction, the next MUCInstruction otherwise
